settings.subtitle: THE ITEM I WANT TO BUY IS OUT OF STOCK, WHEN WILL IT BE RE STOCKED?
settings.interior:
ALL UPDATES FOR RESTOCKS & DROPS ARE ANNOUNCED ON OUR INSTAGRAM. ALTERNATIVELY YOU CAN SUBSCRIBE TO OUR MAILING LIST!

MAKE SURE YOU ARE FOLLOWING US @NII.HAI AND HAVE NOTIFICATIONS TURNED ON SO YOU DON’T MISS A THING!

settings.subtitle: WHERE CAN I FIND MY ORDER CONFIRMATION?
settings.interior:
SHORTLY AFTER MAKING AN ORDER YOU SHOULD RECEIVE CONFIRMATION SENT TO THE EMAIL YOU PROVIDED ATCHECKOUT.

SHORTLY AFTER MAKING AN ORDER YOU SHOULD RECEIVE CONFIRMATION SENT TO THE EMAIL YOU PROVIDED AT CHECKOUT.


IF IT IS NOT IN YOUR INBOX PLEASE CHECK YOUR SPAM/JUNK FOLDER.


IF AFTER THIS IF YOU HAVE STILL NOT RECEIVED CONFIRMATION, PLEASE EMAIL HELP@NIIHAI.CO.UK PLEASE STATE IN THE SUBJECT LINE ’NO ORDER CONFIRMATION’
IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL PLEASE STATE:

 

NAME
EMAIL
DATE OF ORDER ADDRESS
ORDER CONTENTS

 

SO WE CAN LOCATE YOUR ORDER INFORMATION AND RE SEND THIS TO YOU.

 

 

 

EDIT ORDER

settings.subtitle: HOW DO I CHANGE MY ADDRESS?
settings.interior:
WE ASK YOU TO PLEASE CHECK YOUR DELIVERY ADDRESS IS CORRECT BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER.

IF THE DELIVERY ADDRESS NEEDS TO CHANGED PLEASE CONTACT HELP@NIIHAI.CO.UK PLEASE STATE IN THE SUBJECT LINE ‘EDIT ADDRESS - (YOUR # ORDER NUMBER)’ IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL PLEASE STATE:

NAME
ORDER NUMBER NEW ADDRESS

ONLY IF YOUR ORDER IS NOT YET FULFILLED WE CAN MAKE RELEVANT CHANGES TO YOUR ADDRESS.

settings.subtitle: HOW DO I CHANGE THE SIZE ORDERED?
settings.interior: WE ASK YOU TO PLEASE CHECK YOU HAVE CHOSEN THE CORRECT SIZE BEFORE PLACING YOUR ORDER. SIZES CAN NOT BE CHANGED.

settings.subtitle: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY ORDER?
settings.interior:
WE AIM TO DISPATCH MOST ORDERS WITHIN 72 WORKING HOURS AFTER RECEIVING, MONDAY TO FRIDAY. (EXCLUDING PUBLIC HOLIDAYS.)

ONCE YOUR ORDER HAS BEEN DISPATCHED YOU WILL RECEIVE AN EMAIL NOTIFYING YOU THAT YOUR ORDER HAS BEEN SHIPPED. THIS EMAIL WILL CONTAIN YOUR TRACKING NUMBER. PLEASE USE THIS TO FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS PROGRESS.

SEE AVERAGE DELIVERY TIMES FOR UK/INTERNATIONAL ORDERS BELOW.
PLEASE NOTE DISPATCH, SHIPPING AND DELIVERY TIMES ARE NOT GUARANTEED THEY ARE MERELY AN AIM.

  1. UK
    AVERAGE DELIVERY TIMES WITHIN THE UK ARE AROUND 1 WEEK.
  2. INTERNATIONAL
    AVERAGE DELIVERY TIMES FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS ARE AROUND 2-3 WEEKS.

settings.subtitle: I HAVE RECEIVED THE INCORRECT ORDER. IE ITEM/SIZE/COLOUR. WHAT SHOULD I DO?
settings.interior:
WE ARE VERY SORRY TO HEAR THIS.
IF YOU EMAIL OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM HELP@NIIHAI.CO.UK WILL HELP YOU SORT THIS FOR YOU. PLEASE STATE IN YOUR SUBJECT LINE ‘RECEIVED INCORRECT ORDER - (YOUR # ORDER NUMBER)’

IN THE BODY OF THE EMAIL PLEASE STATE:

NAME
ORDER NUMBER CONTENTS ORDERED
THE CONTENTS RECEIVED

TO SHOW THE INCORRECT ITEM/COLOUR/SIZE. PLEASE ATTACH PHOTO EVIDENCE OF THE INCORRECT ITEM(S) RECEIVED.

settings.subtitle: PAY IN 3
settings.interior:
PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALLATIONS FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

KLARNA IS A SWEDISH PAYMENT SERVICE PROVIDER THAT TAKES END-TO-END RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR PAYMENT. KLARNA IS THE PROVIDER OF SMOOTH PAYMENTS TO MORE THAN 200,000 ONLINE STORES. OVER 85 MILLION CONSUMERS WORLDWIDE HAVE TRUSTED KLARNA TO SECURELY HANDLE THEIR PAYMENTS.

 

HOW DOES PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS WORK?

 

PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALLATIONS WILL ALLOW YOU TO SPREAD THE COST OF YOUR PURCHASE OVER 3 EQUAL PAYMENTS. THE PAYMENT FOR EACH INSTALLATION WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE COLLECTED FROM THE DEBIT OR CREDIT CARD YOU ENTERED AT CHECKOUT. YOUR FIRST INSTALLATION WILL BE COLLECTED WHEN YOUR ORDER IS CONFIRMED BY [MERCHANT] AND INSTALMENTS 2 AND 3 ARE SCHEDULED 30 AND 60 DAYS LATER, RESPECTIVELY. YOU CAN ALWAYS MONITOR YOUR PAYMENTS ’SCHEDULE IN THE KLARNA APP.

 

AM I ELIGIBLE FOR PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS?

 

TO USE PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS YOU MUST BE AT LEAST 18. WHILST THIS OPTION IS WIDELY PROMOTED, PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS IS SUBJECT TO YOUR FINANCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES. WHEN CHOOSING PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS, OUR ASSESSMENT WILL NOT AFFECT YOUR CREDIT RATING.

 

HOW CAN I INCREASE MY CHANCES OF BEING ACCEPTED FOR PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS?

 

KLARNA IS UNIQUE AND OFFERS PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALLATIONS BASED ON A NUMBER OF FACTORS SUCH AS THE ORDER VALUE, PREVIOUS ORDER HISTORY AND ITEM AVAILABILITY. IF YOU ARE 18 OR OVER, YOU CAN IMPROVE YOUR CHANCES OF BEING OFFERED PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS BY ENSURING YOU PROVIDE YOUR FULL NAME AND ACCURATE ADDRESS DETAILS AND SHIPPING TO YOUR REGISTERED BILLING ADDRESS. ALL ORDERS ARE ASSESSED INDIVIDUALLY. JUST BECAUSE YOU HAVE BEEN ACCEPTED FOR A KLARNA PAYMENT METHOD BEFORE DOES NOT MEAN IT WILL BE OFFERED FOR EVERY ORDER AND IN TURN, AS IT IS DENIED DOES NOT MEAN IT WILL BE DENIED FOR ALL FUTURE ORDERS.

 

WHAT DO I NEED TO PROVIDE WHEN I MAKE A PURCHASE?

 

IF YOU WANT TO MAKE A PURCHASE WITH KLARNA USING PAY LATER IN 3 INTEREST-FREE INSTALMENTS, YOU'LL NEED TO PROVIDE YOUR MOBILE PHONE NUMBER, EMAIL ADDRESS, CURRENT BILLING ADDRESS AND A DEBIT OR CARD CARD. THE MOBILE NUMBER IS REQUIRED IN CASE WE NEED TO REACH YOU. ALL COMMUNICATIONS WILL BE SENT TO YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS. IT'S VERY IMPORTANT THAT YOU GIVE US THE CORRECT DETAILS, AS OTHERWISE YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE YOUR PAYMENT SCHEDULE AND ANY UPDATED ORDER INFORMATION.

settings.subtitle: HELP
settings.interior: IF YOU NEED ANY HELP PLEASE EMAILHELP@NIIHAI.CO.UK

settings.subtitle: COSTUMER SERVICE
settings.interior: OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM WORKS MONDAY TO FRIDAY, PLEASE ALLOW 1-2 WORKING DAYS FOR A RESPONSE.

settings.subtitle: ENQUIERES
settings.interior: FOR ANY WHOLESALE/STOCKIST ENQUIRIES, STYLISTS OR BRAND COLLABORATIONS, CONTACT: ROSALINDIS@NIIHAI.CO.UK

settings.subtitle: CLEARLY STATE IN SUBJECT LINE REASON FOR CONACT

settings.title:
*THERE IS AN UNFORTUNATE CUSTOMS ISSUE WHICH MAY RESULT IN YOUR ORDER BEING RETURNED (INTERNATIONAL ORDERS ONLY) WE ARE SO SORRY FOR THIS - IF THIS AFFECTS YOUR ORDER WE WILL ORGANISE A RE SHIPMENT ONCE WE RECEIVE THIS ORDER BACK WITH US

 

AS A SMALL TEAM WE ARE DOING OUR BEST TO FULFIL ALL ORDERS WITH THE URGENCY AND CARE THEY DESERVE. WE SHIP ALL OF OUR ORDERS OURSELVES FROM OUR WAREHOUSE IN LONDON.

 

WE ARE VERY SORRY FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE THIS MAY CAUSE. THANK YOU FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING AND PATIENCE. 

 

WITH LOVE, 

 

NII HAI 

*SHIPPING FEES ARE FIXED AND NON REFUNDABLE, ORDERS WILL NOT BE CANCELLED DUE TO DELAYS*
NO EXCHANGES. RETURNS ARE ACCEPTED ONLY WITHIN 14 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF DELIVERY.
WE DO NOT ACCEPT RETURNS ON ITEMS SUCH AS; SALE/ARCHIVE PIECES, JEWELLERY, ANY UNDERGARMENT, SWIMWEAR OR SHAPEWEAR.
WE DO NOT PROVIDE RETURNS LABELS, A RETURN IS COVERED BY THE CUSTOMER AND ONLY REFUNDED FOR THE ITEM ONCE RETURNED TO US.

PROOF OF POSTAGE FOR RETURNS MUST BE PROVIDED IN ORDER FOR A RETURN TO BE SUCCESSFULLY PROCESSED. THE ITEM (BEING RETURNED) IS THE CUSTOMERS RESPONSIBILITY UNTIL IT IS RECEIVED BACK WITH US. THEREFORE WE ADVISE TO RETURN USING A TRACKED SERVICE.
